alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 5:25PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Beaver and northeastern Iron Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 524 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northwest of Paragonah, or 20 miles southwest of Beaver, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Beaver and northeastern Iron Counties. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 85 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
